content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm pleased to hear from you. Let's focus on the rental price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright Maryam, I offer the apartment for 700 euros a month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam. I'm not satisfied with that price. I'm looking for a higher amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I could lower it to 650 euros a month. That's the lowest I can go.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Maryam, but I'm still not satisfied. I'm looking for a higher price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I could go lower, but it wouldn't be fair to the neighborhood. The average rent in this area is 600 euros a month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your point, Maryam. However, I'm looking to get more than the average rent for my apartment. I believe its location and condition justify a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can't go any lower than 600 euros a month. That's the minimum I can offer.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Maryam, but I'm not satisfied with that price. I believe my apartment is worth more than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can't go any lower than 550 euros a month. That's the minimum I can offer.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Maryam, but I'm not satisfied with that price. I believe my apartment is worth more than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
